content:
With the generous reward that the jarl has given you, it is certainly possible to buy a horse. The exact cost of a horse can vary depending on the region and the quality of the animal, but you should have enough gold to purchase a decent mount.

However, keep in mind that owning a horse also comes with additional expenses, such as food, shelter, and care. You will need to factor these costs into your budget as well.

If you decide to buy a horse, it can be a valuable asset for your adventures, allowing you to travel faster and cover greater distances. It can also help you carry more gear and supplies, making it easier to explore the wilderness and take on new challenges.
